issue.title: [Integration] archery integration --with-LANG flags don't work
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8099](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8099). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The flags are named --with-LANG, but the actual parameter is enable_LANG.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8099?focusedCommentId=17058217) by David Li (lidavidm):*
My bad, I was on an old branch.
